title: Protect Our Patriarch - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Psychological   Slice of Life   Xuanhuan
tags: Ancient Times   Arranged Marriage   Betrayal   Black Belly   Blood Manipulation   Bloodlines   Business Management   Calm Protagonist   Caring Protagonist   Character Growth   Childcare   Clan Building   Clever Protagonist   Cultivation   Cunning Protagonist   Cute Children   Family   Family Business   Farming   Hard-Working Protagonist   Insects   Magic Beasts   Male Protagonist   Mature Protagonist   Modern Knowledge   Monsters   Multiple Personalities   Poor to Rich   Schemes And Conspiracies   Smart Couple   Strategic Battles   Strong Love Interests   Transmigration   Weak to Strong
author: 傲无常
description:
Transmigrated into a xuanhuan Patriarch, this novel portrays the xuanhuan world as realistically as possible from the perspective of the Wang clan. 

There’s planting spiritual fields, raising spiritual fish, and the comprehensive development of various family industries. The Patriarch also raises salted fish elders (people who have no intention of doing anything) to become ancestors who assumed roles of protective umbrellas while inspiring his juniors to brave The Holy Land Palace of Learning in order to excel.

This is not a hot-blooded combat-style xuanhuan, although there are strategic battles. Instead, it focuses on the promotion of various family industries, capital, facilities, family servants, family generals, clansmen, guests, in-laws, and other important elements. It tries to look at the 'old-fashioned' xuanhuan world from a fresh perspective.>
